author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44733

#### PR description:

This PR is a quick follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44718 in order to make `cmssw` on-par with the version of  the "V1.1" menu for the 2024 pp data-taking period.

This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:
- [CMSHLT-3153](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3153) : [PRO/PPS] Set smartPS=1 for PPS-Jet trigger
- [CMSHLT-3159](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3159) : [BTV/EXO] Add two `PNet3BTag` Paths to `GRun` subtable
- [CMSHLT-3160](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3160) : [TSG] Set PS=1 for non-AXO Scouting Paths in "2p0E34_NoAXO" column
 
 In addition update the `makeOnlineSpecial` script as used to derive the V1.2 of the FOG "Special" menus.
#### PR validation:

TSG integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44733 to the 2024 data-taking release (CMSSW_14_0_X)
title: HLT menu development for `14_0_X` (6/N)
